name: isg-client
description: An HTTP client for accessing the Internet Services Gateway (ISG) API to control heat pumps of Stiebel Eltron / Tecalor

scripts.build: parcel build ./lib/isg-client.js --out-file isg-client-dist.js --no-source-maps --target node && parcel build ./lib/isg-client.js --no-source-maps --no-minify --target node

author: Jan Stock
